itemBody.p: Lorna is flying back home to the UK. Ideally, she would like to fly in directly to her home town of Glasgow. Edinburgh is her second choice and, if necessary, she could fly into London and pick up an internal connecting flight. Although she has been offered a cheap flight to Manchester it remains her least favourite option as connecting flights to Glasgow are not very reliable from there.

graphicOrderInteraction.prompt: Mark the airports shown on the map according to Lorna's preferences.
